BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTCON_TDS_RATE_MST (str_grant_type_code,NUM_TDSRATE_ID,NUM_TDS_RATE, NUM_SURCHG_RATE, NUM_EDUCESS_RATE, gdt_effective_frm, gdt_effective_to, gstr_remarks, gdt_entry_date, gnum_slno, gnum_isvalid, gnum_seat_id, gnum_hospital_code) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE ACTCON_TDS_RATE_MST SET STR_GRANT_TYPE_CODE=?,NUM_TDS_RATE=?,NUM_SURCHG_RATE=?,NUM_EDUCESS_RATE=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GSTR_REMARKS=? ,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_TDSRATE_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTCON_TDS_RATE_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_TDSRATE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTCON_TDS_RATE_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_TDSRATE_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTCON_TDS_RATE_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_TDSRATE_ID= ? and GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
